name: OscarPicks
0:
”Alexa, Ask Oscar Picks for Best Actor nominees”
”Alexa, Open Oscar Picks”
”Alexa, Start Oscar Picks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oscar picks
Developer Terms of Use
des:
And the winner is... Pick your winner for best film, lead actress, cinematography et al from the
Oscar 2018 nominees.
Hear others choice in real time as you vote.
You can change your vote any number of times until the 3rd of March.
There are several categories to choose from.
Have some fun!

Alexa, ask Oscar Picks for best picture nominees
Alexa, ask Oscar Picks for best actor
Alexa, ask Oscar picks for categories
Alexa, ask Oscar Picks for help
 
Or

Alexa, Open Oscar Picks
then:
 Alexa, list categories
 Alexa, help
 Alexa, best picture nominees
 Alexa, stop
To hear the nomination list again, say Alexa repeat.

Note: This is a not an official Skill from Oscar or its partners or associates.
